solution_line_template: Her friend will pay ${friend_per_day} x {num_days} = $<<{friend_per_day}*{num_days}={friend_total}>>{friend_total} after {num_days} days.
Her brother will pay ${brother_per_day} x {num_days} = $<<{brother_per_day}*{num_days}={brother_total}>>{brother_total} after {num_days} days.
Her cousin will pay ${cousin_per_day} x {num_days} = $<<{cousin_per_day}*{num_days}={cousin_total}>>{cousin_total} after {num_days} days.

Therefore, she will be able to collect ${friend_total} + ${brother_total} + ${cousin_total} = $<<{friend_total}+{brother_total}+{cousin_total}={total_collected}>>{total_collected} after {num_days} days.
